activity.title: beckn/future-of-work#1
activity.text:
Hi @ravi-prakash-v 
I'm Nandini, a B.Tech student from IIT Kharagpur, and I'm passionate about AI and systems integration. This project excites me, especially the use of Beckn and AI agents to streamline collaboration.

Iâ€™d love to contribute and learn more about how AI is being implemented here. It would be great if you could share some starting points or key skills I should focus on to get involved effectively. Looking forward to contributing!
